## WE ARE DATA {.smaller}

::: columns
::: {.column width="50%"}
#### [**We are filled with data in today's networked society**]{style="color: blue;"}

-   through our web activity, we are assigned *gender, ethnicity, class, age, education level, and potential status of parent with x no. of children* ([digital trace data/digital footprint/digital breadcrumbs]{style="color: orange;"})

-   if internet metadata identifies a user as foreigner than they lose right to privacy afforded to U.S. citizens

-   who would have thought that [*class status, citizenship, ethnicity*]{.underline} could be algorithmically understood?
:::
